name: Cups - Water Sort Puzzle
description:
Water Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game!

At each stage of this brain game you will unlock new challenges! You'll have to go through the tap puzzle stage, after the brick puzzle, until you finally master the Water sort puzzle!


It's a challenging yet relaxing color sorting puzzle game!
Try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors in the same glass.

*HOW TO PLAY:*

- Tap any glass bottle to pour water to another bottle.
- The rule is that you can only pour the water to another bottle if it is linked to the same color and there's enough space on the glass bottle.
